title: [FSX/P3D] - Majestic Dash8 Q400 PRO Edition 1.018
description:
Installation
=========================

1. Start the installation and proceed to the page _BEFORE_ "Authorization Page". Enter any fake data here for ORDER NUMBER,CUSTOMER EMAIL ADDRESS and CUSTOMER LAST NAME.

2. Open your personal Temp folder (for Win7 it is located in c:UsersYOUR NAMEAppDataLocalTemp). You
   should find there temp folder with name like  nsiF2EB.tmp (may be different any time you start the
   installer - check the creation date to find it).

3. Copy or overwrite there (if already exists) InstallOptions.dll file provided in the crack. Proceed with the
   installation normally.

4. After installation program is finished go to your FSX folder, then to SimObjectsAirplanesmjc8q400panel.
   Replace mjc84_main.dll with the one supplied in the crack
